abstract: A research vessel will embark on a 7,000-mile voyage to get a clearer idea of the sheer amount of trash in the ocean and the speed at which it is dispersing.
snippet: A research vessel will embark on a 7,000-mile voyage to get a clearer idea of the sheer amount of trash in the ocean and the speed at which it is dispersing.

headline.main: Tracking the Debris From Japan's Tsunami
